caption: Finally got the chance to try Moni’s yesterday! We ordered 2 dinner plates (be prepared for generous servings). The jerk catfish nuggets were on point and had so much flavor! Green beans and greens were good. The cheeseburger was okay, we liked the seasoning on the meat but didn’t really think it belonged on a hamburger. The best part about the meal was the Mac and cheese. Hands down one of the best Mac and cheese we’ve ever had from a restaurant. We can’t wait to buy from this establishment again.

I've heard from customers the food is quite exquisite, unfortunately I didn't have the chance to sample for myself. I was deterred by the level of customer service received when first entering the restaurant. We were greeted with a hello and that was that. No instruction on how to order food or how the establishment operated.

So good!  The Jerk Chicken Cheese Fries are to die for.  The specials are fantastic.  The taste of home cooking is not lost on this place.  So far I've been in three times and have tried multiple items off the menu including Fried Pork Chops, Hamburger w/ Fries, Mac & Cheese, Cornbread Stuffing and Stewed Pears. Everything I've had is as if my own mother made it with love.  Thank you for such a wonderful place to find that comfort food we're all looking for.
